headline: Coterra Energy Reports 2024 Results, Provides 2025 Guidance and Updated Three-Year Outlook, and Announces Dividend Increase
summary: HOUSTON, February 24, 2025--Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE: CTRA) ("Coterra" or the "Company") today reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 results, provided first-quarter and full-year 2025 guidance, and released a new three-year outlook for 2025 through 2027.

content.title: Coterra Energy Reports 2024 Results, Provides 2025 Guidance and Updated Three-Year Outlook, and Announces Dividend Increase
content.summary: HOUSTON, February 24, 2025--Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE: CTRA) ("Coterra" or the "Company") today reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 results, provided first-quarter and full-year 2025 guidance, and released a new three-year outlook for 2025 through 2027.

headline: Dan O. Dinges and Robert S. Boswell to Retire from Coterra Energy Board of Directors
summary: HOUSTON, February 24, 2025--Coterra Energy Inc. ("Coterra" or the "Company") (NYSE: CTRA) today announced that Dan O. Dinges and Robert S. Boswell plan to retire from the Board of Directors at the end of their current term and not stand for re-election at Coterra’s 2025 annual meeting of stockholders.

content.title: Dan O. Dinges and Robert S. Boswell to Retire from Coterra Energy Board of Directors
content.summary: HOUSTON, February 24, 2025--Coterra Energy Inc. ("Coterra" or the "Company") (NYSE: CTRA) today announced that Dan O. Dinges and Robert S. Boswell plan to retire from the Board of Directors at the end of their current term and not stand for re-election at Coterra’s 2025 annual meeting of stockholders.
